stripped_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) The first time each turn you advance this agenda, gain 3 credits. Once per turn -> When the Runner makes a successful run on another server, you may remove 1 hosted advancement counter to do 1 meat damage.
